title: Create Share Setting
description: This operation is used to create a share setting for a resource.

account.description: Account for in which the sharing should be valid.

defaultEditEnabled.description: Default edit access of the recipients.

organizationSharingEnabled.description: Whether resource is shared with all members of the account (if mentioned).

sharedResourceType.description: Type of the resource being shared.

relativeTo.description: ID of the resource being shared.
